word:
YOU ASK IF HER HELPERS BROUGHT STATEMENTS TO HER ATTENTION WHICH THEY THOUGHT WOULD HELP HER IN HER WRITINGS. NOTHING OF THIS KIND OCCURRED PREVIOUS TO THE WRITING OF GREAT CONTROVERSY, VOLUME IV, AT HEALDSBURG, 
                                                                           464
IN 1883 OR 1884. THEN IT WAS SELDOM AND RELATED TO MINOR DETAILS.
